item.title: Grouphug - Batching transactions without interaction between users
item.description: With the intention of trying to help make Bitcoin transactions more economical and inspired by the implementation of Peach made by Czino GroupHug has been born. A transaction batching system that allows to share between users the fees of a transaction without the need of coordination between users. This post explains what GroupHug is, how it works technically and what advantages and disadvantages it has. high five ._./
